product.name: One Stop
product.text: Take advantage of our custom design capabilities and vast network of suppliers and partners. Whatever your needs, we will build it, print it, design it or locate it for you and save you money in the process.

product.name: No Bids
product.text: Save time and cut costs by avoiding the formal bid process. The State of Washington allows non-profits to order direct from Correctional Industries through state contracts, so you can avoid the delay and expense of requesting bids and comparing them.

product.name: Local Economy
product.text: Everybody wins when local dollars stay local. By purchasing from local suppliers and supplying jobs, Correctional Industries contributes more than $30 million each year to Washington’s economy.

product.name: Offender Workers
product.text: CI’s production and installation needs are fulfilled by offenders serving time at Washington state correctional facilities. Offenders with job skills are less likely to offend again and the wages they earn from CI defray the cost of incarceration, making the most of taxpayer dollars.

product.name: Office Systems
product.text: Modular office systems, like this Volition system, are stylish and can be configured and reconfigured any way you like. Combine desks with panel systems or movable walls for extra privacy and flexibility.

product.name: Ergonomic Seating
product.text: Comfort and reduced strain boost job satisfaction and productivity. Ergonomic task seating from Correctional Industries, including Snap (right) and Stratus (left), accommodate any user with a multitude of settings and adjustments.

product.name: Indoor Signage
product.text: Custom engraved signs make entrances, exits and facilities easy to identify for both staff and clientele, minimizing confusion and improving traffic flow in your buildings. ADA compliant Braille signs available.

product.name: Lanyards
product.text: ID badges are a cost-efficient way to identify visitors or large numbers of staff. Durable lanyards are available in a variety of colors. Customize with screen printing.

product.name: Embroidered Shirts
product.text: Volunteers and staff look professional and ready for action with custom embroidered shirts from CI. Lightweight, durable, easy to wash and comfortable, customized shirts clearly identify your crew and promote your organization.

product.name: Patches
product.text: Embroidered patches from CI stand out clearly to identify your staff and volunteers. Top-quality workmanship, free digitizing and competitive pricing make CI patches a great value.

product.name: Banners
product.text: Quality workmanship, competitive pricing and fast turnaround make custom banners from CI a great way to declare your message.

product.name: Podiums
product.text: Custom-built podiums give your events a professional and unified appearance. CI’s highly trained design staff and furniture crafters can facilitate all your custom furniture needs, including furniture with special or unusual features.

product.name: Seating
product.text: Stackable seating, like this Dakota Chair, turns any space into an auditorium or meeting room. Easily configure your space any way you like. Chairs store conveniently away after the event.

product.name: Signs
product.text: Rugged and highly visible, these portable signs are available in a variety of sizes and colors. Apply custom decals, or use removable sign blanks for increased versatility.

product.name: Awards
product.text: Recognize contributors and achievers with beautiful high-quality awards and plaques from CI. Choose a classic design or request a custom shape unique to your organization or award category.

product.name: Promotional Items
product.text: Put your logo or custom design on jerseys, sweat shirts, T-shirts, hats, jackets, towels, coffee mugs, binders and more. Whatever you can imagine, we can print it.

product.name: Screen Printing
product.text: Correctional Industries uses Plastisol inks that are soft and permanent to create a higher quality and more durable print. Competitive pricing with no set-up or artwork fees makes CI your best screen printing value.

product.name: Folding Chairs
product.text: Our Switch folding tables are perfect for setting up fundraising booths or charity events in a hurry. Steel folding chairs are an economical yet durable seating solution.

product.name: Residential Living
product.text: Residential furniture from CI remains sturdy through many years of use. Choose from standard lines or we’ll custom design furniture for your specific needs. A great variety of upholstery and finishes available.

product.name: Lounge Furniture
product.text: Overstuffed cushioning makes the Minuet Lounge Settee a comfortable addition to any community space. Our lounge seating and tables are built to endure the rigorous use.

product.name: Food Services
product.text: Prepared meals from CI make food service simple: main entrees, baked goods, soups, frozen meals and snack packs. Smocks, aprons, shirts and thermal meal carriers are also available.

product.name: First Aid
product.text: Always be prepared with safety kits and supplies from CI. Our larger kits contain over 100 first aid, biohazard and infectious disease protection items. Or hand-pick items for a customized kit.

product.name: Recycle Bins
product.text: Make recycling convenient by placing these ergonomic and durable bins anywhere. Recycling reduces waste and expense, and it showcases your commitment to the future.

product.name: Outdoor
product.text: Keep outdoor areas attractive with weather-resistant wood or aluminum benches and tables. Many styles of barbecues and campfire rings available with an environmentally friendly powder coat.

product.name: Signage
product.text: Beautiful custom redwood signs and highly-visible aluminum signs get your message across where you need it most. We can also refurbish your old signs to save you money.

product.name: Janitorial
product.text: The CorrectPac complete sanitation program offers concentrated detergents in single pack sizes that match standard container sizes. Now it’s easy to get correct portions and reduce waste.

product.name: Files Storage
product.text: Attractive, functional and secure, CI offers a large selection of wood and metal storage options, including the lateral shelving (right) and metal lockers (left) seen here.

product.name: Classroom Furniture
product.text: Classroom, conference room, meeting room: you need flexibility to get the most out of any space. CI’s sturdy classroom desks and chairs are designed for multiple arrangements and uses.

product.name: Chairs Desks
product.text: Our Pacific (left) and Glacier (right) student chairs and desks are made to withstand heavy use. Arrange them anyway you like for the best classroom atmosphere.

product.name: Custom Design
product.text: Need something unusual or have a special furnishing need? Our team of designers will work with you to create customized products to fit your need perfectly. Design services are free when you purchase products from Correctional Industries.

product.name: Sustainable
product.text: We recognize our responsibility to protect human health, the environment and natural resources. Whenever possible, Correctional Industries uses environmentally-friendly finishes and recycled wood, metal and fabrics.

product.name: Furniture Refurbishing
product.text: Correctional Industries' re-upholstery and refurbishing services can breathe new life into your torn seating or other worn furnishings. Your upholstered and wood furniture will look like new at a fraction of the price.

product.name: Sign Refurbishing
product.text: We’ll renew your discolored or faded signs with new reflective sheeting materials. Fresh visibility at significant cost savings over new signs.
